text: anyone know how to override `?hsLang=en`  query string on links?
Settings -> Website -> Domains & URLs -> Language Settings -> Enable Language Specific Redirects -> turn off that switch

unfortunately, this is the only way right now, and it disables the ability to localize pages for multi-locale sites. i’ve battled this in the past with a multi-language site and wound up having to take the query parameter off with javascript in a couple cases :woman-facepalming::skin-tone-3:
